name: pl-copyfind
description: ideas are based on those found at plagiarism.bloomfieldmedia.com's CopyFind/WCopyFind

scripts.build:debug: echo building debug... && npm run build:base -s > demos/node-bundle.js
scripts.build:release: echo building release... && npm run build:base -s | uglifyjs --c --m > demos/node-bundle.js
